items.name: Cellphone
items.description: My personal phone. Hiro bought it for me.

items.name: To-Do List
items.description: A list of things I want to do before I die.

items.name: To-Do List
items.description: A list of things I want to do before I die.

items.name: Red Ribbon
items.description: A soft and silky red ribbon.

items.name: Red Thread
items.description: Some red thread from mother's sewing kit. The color matches my scarf.

items.name: Red Shoelaces
items.description: From the shoerack. Does something like this count?

items.name: Red Paint
items.description: A can of red paint. It's dusty.

items.name: Bird Food
items.description: All-Natural Non-GMO Certified Organic Bird Food. It's as expensive as it sounds.

items.name: Red Marker
items.description: A non-erasable alcohol-based red marker.

items.name: Lipstick
items.description: Some red lipstick from mother's makeup set. It says "Crimson Passion".

items.name: Ritual Letter
items.description: The ritual instructions I received.

items.name: Ritual Letter
items.description: The ritual instructions I received.

items.name: Table Salt
items.description: "For cooking and baking". Salt can supposedly ward off spirits and such.

items.name: Notebook
items.description: I keep my personal notes and papers I find here.

items.name: Rune
items.description: A rune stone I bought from a shady online merchant.

items.description: A rune stone I found.

items.name: Rune
items.description: A rune stone I found.

items.name: Number 375
items.description: A waiting number for the train station in the forest. Unusually high.

items.name: Blue Sign
items.description: It says "Daylight Gate".

items.name: Pack of Chips
items.description: Looks like regular potato chips. The brand is literally called "Harmless Snack".

items.name: Chocolate Bar
items.description: Looks like a bar of chocolate. The brand is literally called "Harmless Snack".

items.name: Bug Net
items.description: A bug net Rune gave me. I don't know what I'll do with it.

items.name: Empty Lamp
items.description: The case of a street lamp. It has nothing inside.

items.name: Lamp with Fireflies
items.description: A street lamp full of fireflies.

items.name: Empty Jar
items.description: A jar with nothing inside.

items.name: Jar of Fireflies
items.description: A jar full of fireflies.

items.name: Bolt Cutter
items.description: A bolt cutter Rune gave me. Looks strong.

items.name: Fish
items.description: A fish thing I purchased from a merchant. I don't think I should eat this.

items.name: Jar of Slugs
items.description: A jar of slugs. Heavy.

items.name: Stone Curse Notes
items.description: Notes explaining a ritual to remove a "Stone Curse".

items.name: Artistic Pot
items.description: A pot I found. Hopefully it works as a new head for Kozmo.

items.name: Stone Curse Cure
items.description: A sort of potion I made. It should cure a simple stone curse.

items.name: Weird Sculpture
items.description: A thing I found. I'm almost a bit ashamed of having to give this to Kozmo.

items.name: Teapot-Shaped Head
items.description: It came off the sculptor. It's empty inside.

items.name: Artist's Flower
items.description: It came off the sculptor. It smells good.

items.name: Cursed Tree Bark
items.description: A piece I tore off a tree. Allegedly cursed.

items.name: Ink Mushrooms
items.description: Black mushrooms.

items.name: Lit Candle
items.description: A candle I took from a statue at the sculptor's house.

items.name: Unlit Candle
items.description: A candle I took from a statue at the sculptor's house.

items.name: Blue Candle
items.description: A candle that the candle person gave to me.

items.name: AC Adapter
items.description: A power plug adapter. It converts a 3-prong plug for a 2-prong socket.

items.name: Scissors
items.description: A pair of scissors. Pointy!

items.name: Padlock Key
items.description: A key that should open the gate with the warning sign.

items.name: Caterpillar
items.description: The moths asked me to get rid of him for a reward.

items.name: Treasure Hunter's Letter
items.description: A letter I found under a statue.

items.name: Treasure Hunter's Note 1
items.description: A note I found. It talks about the Locked Site.

items.name: Treasure Hunter's Note 2
items.description: A note I found. It talks about the Locked Site.

items.name: Treasure Hunter's Note 3
items.description: A note I found. It talks about the Locked Site.

items.name: Treasure Hunter's Note 4
items.description: A note I found. It talks about the Locked Site.

items.name: Secret Passage Code
items.description: Contains the code to open the secret passage under Red's house.

items.name: Boat Paddle
items.description: Perfect for rowing a boat.

items.name: Injured Bunny
items.description: It couldn't run away, so now it's in my inventory. Looks like it has a broken leg.

items.name: Pink Flower
items.description: Pretty!

items.name: Lavender Flower
items.description: Smells like laundry.

items.name: White Tree Branch
items.description: Pretty!

items.name: Dead Goldfish
items.description: Might have been better off where it was.

items.name: Black Algae
items.description: Some algae I fished from the bottom of the lake.

items.name: Blue Algae
items.description: Some algae I fished from the bottom of the lake.

items.name: Green Algae
items.description: Some algae I fished from the bottom of the lake.

items.name: Pink Petals
items.description: Some flower petals I found.

items.name: Purple Petals
items.description: Some flower petals I found.

items.name: White Petals
items.description: Some flower petals I found.

items.name: Handle (Square)
items.description: A purple handle for a valve mechanism. The protusion is square-shaped.

items.name: Handle (Pentagon)
items.description: A red handle for a valve mechanism. The protusion is pentagon-shaped.

items.name: Handle (Star)
items.description: A yellow handle for a valve mechanism. The protusion is shaped like a 5-point star.

items.name: Handle (Diamond)
items.description: A white handle for a valve mechanism. The protusion is diamond-shaped.
It's sharp.

items.name: Iron Key
items.description: A fairly large metallic key.

items.name: Copper Key
items.description: A regular key. It probably opens a door somewhere.

items.name: Bucket
items.description: A metallic bucket. It can transport various liquid substances.

items.name: Bucket of Water
items.description: A bucket full of water. It's heavy.

items.name: Bucket of Special Water
items.description: A bucket full of water. It comes from a special faucet in the forest.

items.name: Flat Screwdriver
items.description: A simple screwdriver.

items.name: Coin
items.description: A coin that's not quite like the ones back home.

items.name: Return Doorknob
items.description: Apparently, this is my ticket back home. I purchased it online.

items.name: Doorknob With Flower
items.description: A doorknob. I found this lying around.

items.name: Doorknob Fragment
items.description: Pieces of a doorknob. I can't put them back together on my own.

items.name: Gray Doorknob
items.description: A doorknob. It has the same symbol as my letter.

items.name: White Doorknob
items.description: A doorknob. It looks like a white lily.

items.name: Doorknob With Eye
items.description: A doorknob I got from the moths. Can probably be used at that door with the slots.

items.name: Doorknob Fragment
items.description: Pieces of a doorknob. I can't put them back together on my own.

items.name: Paper Lily Folding Steps
items.description: Instructions detailing how to fold a piece of paper to look like a lily flower.

items.name: Facility Map
items.description: A map of the facility, drawn by someone.

items.name: Black Knife
items.description: A fully black knife. It's still very sharp.

items.name: Knife
items.description: A knife.

items.name: Human Foot
items.description: A foot that used to belong to someone.

items.name: Sketchbook
items.description: A sketchbook full of colors you splattered all over it.

items.name: Black Object
items.description: An unknown circular object that's fully black. Feels like wood and glass.

items.name: Hand Mirror
items.description: A wooden hand mirror.

items.name: Black Object
items.description: An unknown object that's fully black. Feels like a piece of fabric.

items.name: Cold Compress
items.description: A wet rag.

items.name: Eyeball
items.description: An eyeball. The owner seems to have had golden eyes.

items.name: Small Key
items.description: A small key. Looks like it could belong to a padlock or something similar.

items.name: Key
items.description: A key for something.

items.name: Key
items.description: A key for something.

items.name: Glass Jar
items.description: A small glass jar. I found 3 of them.

items.description: A small glass jar full of water.

items.name: Jar of Red Pigment
items.description: A small glass jar with red pigment. Needs water.

items.name: Jar of Yellow Pigment
items.description: A small glass jar with yellow pigment. Needs water.

items.name: Jar of Blue Pigment
items.description: A small glass jar with blue pigment. Needs water.

items.description: A small glass jar with red paint.

items.name: Jar of Yellow Paint
items.description: A small glass jar with yellow paint.

items.name: Jar of Blue Paint
items.description: A small glass jar with blue paint.

items.name: Grabber
items.description: A long tool that can be used to grab distant objects.

items.name: Lighter
items.description: A lighter.

items.name: Lock Pick
items.description: A lock pick. I don't know how to use this...

items.name: Rainbow Potion
items.description: A strange potion. I wonder what it does...

items.name: Temp. Rainbow Potion
items.description: A strange potion that Spider directed me to. It has a shorter duration than the original one.

items.name: Lily
items.description: A lily. I'm supposed to bring it home with me.

items.name: Red Item I
items.description: A red item. I can't tell what it is.

items.name: Red Item II
items.description: A red item. I can't tell what it is.
